attributes.action: STOP SENDING MONEY TO THIRD WORLD COUNTRIES FOR AID
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to stop sending tax payers money to third world countries, we need to divert it into our own uk to help health service, pensions etc, in other words lets look after our selves for a change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
